subject: P0 Bug Triage — 3 Deploy-Blockers from Community (Mon Morning Priority)
body:
Xavier — 3 P0 community bugs landed overnight that hit QM1 (Reliable Agent Execution Plane). Please triage Monday morning before the discovery run:

1. #23321: Gateway crash loop on WebChat hot-reload race condition (Ubuntu 24, v2026.2.21-2). User can't recover without manual restart.
2. #23307: Config migration resolves ${ENV_VAR} to plaintext — credentials written to openclaw.json on upgrade. Security incident.
3. #23324: Cross-model failover corrupts tool names → HTTP 400. Directly impacts Roman's non-Anthropic reliability work (QM1 EPIC-QM1-3).

All 3 are in the QM1 sprint (joey/QM_PIPELINE.md EPIC-QM1-2 through QM1-5). Per Merge Authority Matrix, you have authority to land fixes without David — just notify him async.

Also: PRs #43 (A2A) and #44 (UI) are waiting on you and Tim. You have merge authority. Don't wait for David. — Joey
